BackstoryDef.title: Reformed Bandit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] failed as a bandit and was captured by a colonial group. While serving a labor sentence, [PAWN_nameDef] realized how much better his life could be and decided to join the colonials after being released from prison.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired Medic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medic in the Armed Forces and retired from military life prematurely after a serious injury.

BackstoryDef.title: Correctional Officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a security guard for captured raiders and bandits.

BackstoryDef.title: Voluntary Militia
BackstoryDef.description: After seeing the astonishing extent of this planet, [PAWN_nameDef] became a Voluntary Militia Trooper in the Colonial Forces. [PAWN_nameDef] transferred to various colonial strongholds in need of manpower, and had to use whatever was on hand to protect them.

BackstoryDef.title: Reserve Colonist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the Colonist Physical Exam and only passed due to a clerical error. [PAWN_nameDef] has no special skills and followed the enlistment orders of the Colonial Fleet to receive simple training, enough to function as a substitute colonist. [PAWN_nameDef] was sent planetside to assist the ongoing colonization efforts

BackstoryDef.title: Riot Suppression Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Due to the chaotic distribution of the faction-controlled areas in most rimworlds, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to accompany the special police tasked with uprooting the countless bandit camps infesting the planet one by one.

BackstoryDef.title: Shuttle Pilot
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a shuttle pilot, transporting many people and materials across the planet. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to solve a lot of problems along the way, both mechanical and human.

BackstoryDef.title: Armed Escort
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of a professional pioneering group. To deal with the constant threats to their squad during the pioneering period, [PAWN_nameDef] used a healthy variety of firearms to protect the colonists [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to.
